original_text: But we do see Jesus! God made him less important than the angels for a short time. And now God has made him the great and powerful king. God did this because Jesus died as a sacrifice on behalf of all people. His death showed that God is very kind. 2: The writer is saying that the words from this Psalm are speaking about Jesus. But we do see Jesus! God made him less important than the angels for a short time. And now God has made him the great and powerful king. God did this because Jesus died as a sacrifice on behalf of all people. His death showed that God is very kind.
korean_text: 오직 우리가 천사들보다 잠시 동안 못하게 하심을 입은 자 곧 죽음의 고난 받으심으로 말미암아 영광과 존귀로 관을 쓰신 예수를 보니 이를 행하심은 하나님의 은혜로 말미암아 모든 사람을 위하여 죽음을 맛보려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: God made him less important than the angels
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그를 천사들보다 덜 중요하게 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: And now God has made him
God did this because Jesus died
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 이렇게 하셨습니다 예수님이 죽었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: as a sacrifice on behalf of all people.
His death showed that God is very kind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 죽음은 하나님이 매우 친절하다는 것을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: that the words from this Psalm
